hydrologistmod:flow.NAME: Flow
hydrologistmod:flow.DESCRIPTION: When you Flow, you may discard any number of cards. You draw that many at the start of your next turn.

fleeting.NAME: Fleeting
fleeting.DESCRIPTION: This card Purges and is removed from your deck on use.

upgrade.NAME: Upgrade
upgrade.DESCRIPTION: Upgrading cards makes them more powerful. Cards can only be upgraded once.

hydrologistmod:corporeal.NAME: Corporeal
hydrologistmod:corporeal.DESCRIPTION: A Corporeal card is any card that did not start the turn in your hand, draw pile, or discard pile.

innate.NAME: Innate
innate.DESCRIPTION: Start each combat with this card in your hand.

retain.NAME: Retain
retain.DESCRIPTION: Not discarded at the end of your turn.

hydrologistmod:mutable.NAME: Mutable
hydrologistmod:mutable.DESCRIPTION: When a card is Transmuted, any Mutable effect is passed on to the next card for the rest of combat.

hydrologistmod:thermal shock.NAME: Thermal Shock
hydrologistmod:thermal shock.DESCRIPTION: A Shocked enemy counts as both Hot and Cool. Applying any Cold or Heat to this enemy will instead increase this duration by 1 turn.

hydrologistmod:cold.NAME: Cold
hydrologistmod:cold.DESCRIPTION: A Cool enemy deals 15% less damage with Attacks. If a Cool enemy becomes Hot, remove it, it loses triple its Cool amount in HP, and apply Thermal Shock for 1 turn.

ethereal.NAME: Ethereal
ethereal.DESCRIPTION: If this card is in your hand at the end of turn, it is exhausted. Exhausted cards are removed from your deck until the end of combat.

hydrologistmod:transmute.NAME: Transmute
hydrologistmod:transmute.DESCRIPTION: Transforms a card in combat into any card of the same rarity available to your current run. The new card deals 1 more damage and gains 1 more Block for the rest of combat. This effect stacks.

hydrologistmod:adaptive.NAME: Adaptive
hydrologistmod:adaptive.DESCRIPTION: An Adaptive X effect changes depending on the Subtype of the last card played this combat. NL Ice: apply X Cold. NL Water: gain 2X Block. NL Steam: apply X Heat.

[E].NAME: [E]
[E].DESCRIPTION: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

hydrologistmod:ebbing.NAME: Ebbing
hydrologistmod:ebbing.DESCRIPTION: When an Ebbing card is discarded from your hand, play it.

hydrologistmod:swappable.NAME: Swappable
hydrologistmod:swappable.DESCRIPTION: A Swappable card is Paired with another card and, while selected, can be freely Swapped between the two by pressing #b

hydrologistmod:purity.NAME: Purity
hydrologistmod:purity.DESCRIPTION: Cards grow stronger through the Transmutation process. Block gain and damage dealt are increased this combat.

hydrologistmod:heat.NAME: Heat
hydrologistmod:heat.DESCRIPTION: A Hot enemy takes 30% increased damage from Attacks. If a Hot enemy becomes Cool, remove it, it loses triple its Hot amount in HP, and apply Thermal Shock for 1 turn.
